name: Space Way
description: Dominate the space road and make the best score ! Space Way is a fast and fun game where the set is synchronized with music !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphique Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: All
